Title: Default Title
description: Invented by Debra C. Lowsky, MS, CCC-SLP, ARK's Grabber® is the original and still most popular oral motor chew tool. The innovative P shape design features an easy-to-hold loop, with a long extension for reaching the back molars. Use it: As an oral fidget for sensory seekers craving stimulation and proprioceptive input As a safe alternative to chewing on hands, knuckles, shirts, pencils, etc. As an alternative to tooth-grinding and/or thumb-sucking To help decrease oral defensiveness and food aversions To practice biting/chewing without the risk of choking To work on jaw strength and stability and oral motor skills To build oral strength, mobility, and control To satisfy the urge to chew for individuals who are fed through a g-tube ARK Grabber® comes in 3 color-coded toughness levels: Standard (red or magenta) - These are the softest ones with the most “squishiness” and “give” to them. Recommended for mild chewers and/or beginners practicing biting/chewing skills Medium Firm / XT (lime green or teal) - XT stands for "Xtra Tough," recommended for moderate chewing. These are firmer, but still chewy. Very Firm / XXT (royal blue or forest green) - XXT stands for "Xtra Xtra Tough," recommended for more avid chewing. These are the most firm and provide the most resistance to the jaw. No chew tool is indestructible, but these are very tough. ARK manufactures the Grabber® in the USA! It's medical grade, FDA compliant, and contains NO lead, phthalates, PVC, BPA, or latex. Measures approximately 5 inches lengthwise, just under 2 across the loop, and half an inch thick. Caution: although these chew tools are sturdy and durable, no chew tool is indestructible. Some individuals (particularly those with heavy oral needs and aggressive biting/chewing) may be able to damage the tools. How long each tool lasts depends on the oral sensory needs of the child, whether or not they are seeing an occupational therapist if needed, as well as many other variables in his/her life. Please supervise at all times and replace if necessary when the item shows signs of wear and tear. For tougher versions of the Grabber, check out the Grabber XT and XXT. For the toughest chew tool overall, see ARK's Y-Chew XXT.
name: Ark's Therapeutic Grabber Chewy Tube Magenta Purple Teether

Title: Default Title
description: ARK's Z-Vibe® is a vibratory oral motor tool that can help build oral tone and improve a variety of speech, feeding, and sensory skills. Use it to provide a varied sensory experience and/or to provide targeted tactile cues within the oral cavity. Its gentle vibration provides a new level of sensory stimulation to increase oral focus and draw more attention to the lips, tongue, cheeks, and jaw. Vibration can also be very calming, soothing, and organizing. The Z-Vibe®'s sleek, innovative design features a lightweight, plastic handpiece with gentle bumps around its circumference for a non-slip grip. This texture can also be brushed along the cheeks, arms, hands, etc. for additional tactile input. The handle comes with a blue Probe Tip on one end and a Switch Tip on the other. Use the Probe Tip for oral motor assessment and development. To turn the unit on, simply twist the Switch Tip at the opposite end of the handle just until the unit starts to vibrate (please do not over-tighten). Designed with versatility in mind, there are over 35 tip attachments available in various sizes, textures, and resiliencies. From spoons to toothbrushes to pencils and more, the same handle can shift goals simply by switching out one tip for another. View them all here. Made in the USA, medical grade, FDA compliant NO lead, phthalates, PVC, BPA, or latex The Z-Vibe® is sold here with 1 Probe Tip and 1 Switch Tip, other tips sold separately. Or, you can add an extra one at a discounted price (regularly $5.99) via the pull-down menu above. Battery included (please note: this is a special Vibe Battery not sold in stores - we recommend buying a spare) Measures approximately 6.5" in length and less than half of an inch in diameter Recommended for individuals of all ages and abilities under the guidance of a therapist or a trained caregiver The Z-Vibe is available in two different versions: plastic (all of the color options) or metal (aluminum). The plastic options are sturdy, affordable, easy-to-clean, and colorfully kid-friendly. The aluminum option has slightly more weight to it, and the metal is cool to the touch. Caution: the Z-Vibe is NOT a toy. It is a therapeutic tool intended to be used by a professional therapist (or by parents trained by their therapist). It contains small parts (including a battery) that may pose a choking hazard: direct adult supervision is required at all times.
name: Ark's Z-Vibe Oral Stimulator For Speech & Feeding

Title: Default Title
description: Enjoy music to the fullest with the Jabra Evolve 40 MS Stereo Wired Headset. This headset is designed to enhance your audio experience and make calls crisp. Be it Skype for Business or Lync PC calls; you can transfer them to your smartphone using Jabra Intelligent call transfer. This function especially comes in handy when you are tired of sitting a one place and need to move out of the office. Connecting this headset to your smartphone or a tablet is as easy as it gets, thanks to the 3.5mm jack. Everyone around you would know that you are busy, as the busy light automatically turns on when you are on any call. Also, you can manually turn the busy light on, to indicate to your colleagues that you don’t want to be disturbed. The well-thought design of the ear cushions eliminates high-frequency noise such as human voices. Thanks to the ergonomic design, this headset is comfortable to wear even for long hours. Key Features Type: On Ear Connectivity: Wired Compatible With: All Color: Black Model Number: JE40 Always Stay Connected This Jabra wired headset, with its Jabra Intelligent call transfer feature, transfers your Skype for business and Lync PC calls to your smartphone. This feature is ideal when you need to head out of your office or move away from the desk. Thanks to the 3.5mm jack, you can easily connect this headset to your smartphone or tablet for an enriched musical experience. Top-Notch Features This Jabra headset features a busy light that turns on automatically during a call. This feature lets your colleague and friends know that you are busy. Also, you can manually activate this light, thereby indicating others that you don’t want to be disturbed. The passive noise cancellation filters out irregular, high frequency sounds such as human voices. This noise cancellation is possible due to the smartly-designed ear cushions. Also, the Jabra Evolve 40 MS headset is compatible with popular online voice call services such as Skype for Business, Google Hangouts, and many more. Enjoy Music to the Fullest This Jabra headset delivers crisp and delightful sound so that you can enjoy every beat. This professional headset offers excellent productivity and exceptional sound quality. With an ergonomic design, this headset provides a perfect fit for your ears.
name: Jabra Evolve 40 Stereo Wired Headset

description: THREE-PIECE: Blackstone nesting lunch box set ,This nifty bento container makes it easy to pack a variety of foods and keep them all separate - and safe from squishing! Blackstone Bento Lunch Box is perfect packing a healthy entree and two side dishes. Size 12 OZ /355 Ml Top , 14 OZ/414 Ml bottom with top lid BIGGER THAN OTHERS: Holding more than 6 CUPS of Food, our lunch box is up to 50% BIGGER than most stainless steel bento lunch boxes on the market. Is it Huge? No. But most other bento boxes are tiny and only hold about 4 cups. At a capacity of 6 Cups, most of our customers find our bento lunch box to be PERFECT for growing Kids and Adults. PROTECT YOURSELF: Our ZERO-PLASTIC Blackstone Lunch Box is made of 100% Top-Grade Stainless Steel and Guaranteed to be BPA-FREE, PVC-FREE, PHTHALATE-FREE, LEAD-FREE and 100% NON-LEACHING. It's the SAFEST option for You and Your Family - plus it's great for the Environment! PERFECT for school, office, travel, picnics, camping. DISHWASHER SAFE: All parts of Blackstone stainless steel bento boxes are dishwasher safe, including the lid! No need to hand wash lids separately from the container bases like with other brands with lids made from plastic or with embedded gunky gaskets.
name: Bento Healthy ECO-safe Stainless Steel BPA Free Lunch Box Blackstone

description: Mr. Krisps belongs to National Food Industries which was founded in the year 1977. It is the only snack manufacturer in the Gulf Region which started this pioneer industry with limited resources. Mr. Krisps is a brand known for its delicious potato Crunches. It is a smart choice for mothers for their kids and family as mid-day light snacking. Mr. Krisps Provides a wide and exciting range made of the finest ingredients to create a good moment on every occasion so that everyone can munch on our irresistible flavors. With delicious cheesy taste, Mr. Krisps Cheesy balls always inspire good times with your friends and family. These crispy and crunchy balls come without any added preservatives and artificial colors. Grab and Go Any Time of The Day! Mr. Krisps offers you a 80 gm of happiness. With these convenient pack of savory snacks, you can pack the lunch box of your kid, and enjoy it anytime when any one’s craving starts for snacks. It can end your hunger and craving for day time snacks. Mr. Krisps never fail to amaze us by bringing innovative and yummy flavors on the table. The scrummy taste of the crunchy potato twisters will satiate your hunger pangs. Real Cheesy Snack with Real Flavors! Classic Cheeze balls munchies are made from the finest ingredients including Corn Meal, Palmolein, Rice, Cheddar Cheese, and Salt offers you the real taste like real food. The extremely crispy snack chips give the happiness of crunch on the very first bite itself. It comes in airtight packaging keeping the cheeze balls from breaking down while maintaining the freshness and hygiene of the perfect hangout snack. Happiness is........Cheeeeeezzzzz!!! Gluten-Free Mr. Krisps cheeze balls are made without any added gluten, making it perfect for anyone who is wanting to minimize or cut gluten out of their diet. Trans Fats Free Cheesy balls comes with zero trans fats means it has no unsaturated fatty acis which is not good for your health. You can have as much as you want. No cholesterol Make family time more fun and memorable with with cheeze balls that contains no cholesterol. They are only tasty and not greasy. No artificial colour and free from preservatives No Gluten. Low Sodium Oven Baked No Trans fat INGREDIENTS Corn Meal, Vegetable Oil, Rice, Cheddar Cheese Flavor (Made Of Cows Milk & Microbial Rennet/Enzyme) With Natural Colors and Salt. NUTRITION Nutritional Values As Per 80G: Fat (27.8G), Calories (451), Protein (1.4G), Carbohydrates (48.8G)
name: Mr Krisps Cheese Balls 80g

Title: Default Title
description: Used by travelers and comfort connoisseurs alike, the Evolution Cool travel pillow by Cabeau is the premium choice. Unlike other neck pillows, the Evolution Cool is designed with proprietary dual-density memory foam that provides total comfort whether your head leans forward or to the side. You will fall asleep in seconds with the revolutionary 360 degree support and custom-adjustable magnetic clasp. Innovative cooling vent technology keeps the neck and head cool to ensure you get the rest you need on those long plane rides or road trips. The Evolution Cool neck pillow was built for convenience and portability; each comes with a deluxe travel bag that allows it to compress down to ½ its size. Do not worry about nasty smells or dirty germs, the removable cover makes it easy to wash and keep clean for your next vacation. Plus, it is even designed to fit most headphones so you can relax with your favorite tunes. Rest easy and wake up feeling fresh with the Evolution Cool travel pillow. FEATURES: BETTER HEAD/CHIN SUPPORT - WATCH VIDEO IMAGE: Unlike other neck pillows, the Evolution Cool is designed with proprietary dual-density memory foam that provides total comfort whether your head leans forward or to the side. COOLING SYSTEM: Designed with an innovative cooling vent technology that keeps the neck and head cooler to ensure you get the rest & relaxation you need on those long airplane rides or road trips. PREMIUM TRAVEL BAG: The Evolution Cool Travel Neck Pillow was built for convenience and portability. It comes with a deluxe high quality travel bag that allows the neck pillow to compress down to ½ its size. The bag also has two convenient pockets to store small items and a secure plastic clip that can attach to your luggage to save valuable airline bag space. WASHABLE COVER: No need to worry about all those unwanted nasty smells or dirty germs, the Cabeau Evolution Cool Travel Pillow's removable cover makes it easy to wash and keep clean for your next vacation.
name: CABEAU Evolution Cool Travel Pillow - Red

description: Size: 80 x 60 cm Engineered specifically for the wall (and all flat smooth surfaces) 100% safe for kids Easily Removable Genuine Quality, from the Original Designers and Manufacturers Decorating with Wall Decals is the easiest, fastest, coolest and most affordable way to transform a boring painted wall in minutes! Just peel and stick! FAQs About Our Wall Decals: Where to place your wall decals? On every smooth surface you can think of. You can peel and stick wall decals on any flat, finished surface in your home. They can be safely applied to flat walls and ceilings, doors, sealed wooden furniture, cabinets, counter tops… even your car! And because decal are waterproof, you can even put them in your bathtub or shower. Is application easy? Yes! It's as easy as peel and stick! Decals are totally customizable and can be cut or repositioned to fit even in the smallest spaces. Use your imagination and get creative! Even though some of our wall decals come with directions, you don’t have to follow them. Apply each sticker to your wall or surface of choice. Are wall decals for all ages? They are, but we recommend your child be at least three of years of age when applying wall decals and always have an adult close by. We offer wall decals for all age groups.
name: Islamic La Ilahi Allah 3D Wall Decal Home Decor

Title: Default Title
description: Purifies the Air - removes bacteria, dust, allergens, smoke and mold from the Air Reduces Stress and Depression - emits uplifting, positive charge of energy For Feng Shui - lamps are usually appealing and calming. They assist in opening blocked energy in your home or workplace This unique work of art is distinctly hand-carved from 100% pure Himalayan Salt, so the salt crystals retain their stunning natural beauty. This also makes each salt lamp one of a kind, contributing to their success as a stunning decor feature, and the perfect, thoughtful gift for holidays and special occasions. Believed to emit Negative Ions that help reduce Stress, Asthma and Allergies HOW THEY WORK Himalayan salt lamps, when heated with a candle or light bulb, emit negative ions which binds to air pollutants (positive ions). This causes them to lower to the ground level, leaving the air fresh. Negative ions are believed to produce beneficial biochemical reactions in our bloodstream that increase levels of serotonin. Please note that the picture and the actual piece might not be identical.
name: Himalayan Pink Detoxer Rock Salt Lamp Wooden Base 2-3kg
